member.name: T:GrayIris.Utilities.UI.Controls.YaScrollButtonStyle
member.summary: Contains styles used to control the scroll buttons for a .

member.name: F:GrayIris.Utilities.UI.Controls.YaScrollButtonStyle.Always
member.summary: Indicates that the scroll buttons should get drawn regardless of whether the tabs extend beyond the visual tab area.

member.name: F:GrayIris.Utilities.UI.Controls.YaScrollButtonStyle.Auto
member.summary: Indicates that the scroll buttons should get drawn only when the tabs extend beyond the visible span of the tab rectangle.

member.name: F:GrayIris.Utilities.UI.Controls.YaScrollButtonStyle.Never
member.summary: Indicates that the scroll buttons should never get drawn.
